justification: There is no relevant information in either the Offering ('What's it got in its pocketses?') or Interfaces ('Land ho.') regarding the ability to safely operate digital twins or manage risks to people, property, or the environment, as required in the Ability.
ability: The ability to operate digital twins without causing unacceptable risk of physical injury or damage to the health of people, either directly, or indirectly as a result of damage to property or to the environment
